content.text:
# List of Cultural Properties of Japan – historical materials (Mie)

This list is of the Cultural Properties of Japan designated in the category of  for the Prefecture of Mie.
National Cultural Properties
As of 1 July 2020, four Important Cultural Properties have been designated, being of national significance.

| align="center"|Trade-related materials of the Kadoya FamilyKadoya-ke bōeki kankei shiryō ||  || Ise ||  || 11 items, comprising a map of East Asia, two flags, and seven scrolls and one volume of documents ||  ||  || [https://kunishitei.bunka.go.jp/heritage/detail/201/10158 ]
|-
| align="center"|Shūko Jisshu woodblocksShūko Jisshu hangi ||  || Kuwana ||  || 1,451 items || ||  || [https://kunishitei.bunka.go.jp/heritage/detail/201/10165 ]
|-

|-

|-
|}
Prefectural Cultural Properties
As of 1 February 2017, ten properties have been designated at a prefectural level.

| align="center"|Administrative documents of Mie PrefectureMie-ken gyōsei bunsho ||  || Tsu || Mie Prefectural Museum || 11,643 items, including 4,342 diagrams and maps || ||  || [https://www.bunka.pref.mie.lg.jp/bunkazai/da/daItemDetail?mngnum=730326&pageCur=2 ]
|-
| align="center"|Okadera Edition woodblocks and related materialsOkadera-ban shūjō hangi narabini kankei shiryō ||  || Matsusaka ||  || 206 items || ||  || [http://www.bunka.pref.mie.lg.jp/bunkazai/da/daItemDetail?mngnum=730256&pageCur=3 ]
|-
| align="center"|Materials relating to Matsuura TakeshirōMatsuura Takeshirō kankei shiryō ||  || Matsusaka || Matsuura Takeshirō Memorial Museum || 223 items || ||  || [http://www.bunka.pref.mie.lg.jp/bunkazai/da/daItemDetail?mngnum=730322&pageCur=3 ]
|-
| align="center"|Izawa Bunko and materials relating to Takegawa ChikusaiIzawa bunko narabini Takegawa Chikusai kankei shiryō ||  || Matsusaka || private || 4,323 items || ||  || [http://www.bunka.pref.mie.lg.jp/bunkazai/da/daItemDetail?mngnum=730398&pageCur=3 ]
|-
| align="center"|Hōei and Ansei Tsunami Memorial Stele (Saimyōji Memorial Stele)Hōei Ansei tsunami kuyō-hi (Saimyōji no kuyō-hi) ||  || Minamiise ||  || commemorates the earthquake and tsunami on the fourth day of the tenth month of Hōei 4 (1707) and that on the fourth day of the eleventh month of Kaei 7 (1854), that year also being the first of Ansei || ||  || [https://www.bunka.pref.mie.lg.jp/bunkazai/da/daItemDetail?mngnum=1093084&pageCur=4 ]
|-
| align="center"|Hōei Tsunami Memorial Stele (Saimyōji Mahayana Sutra Stele)Hōei Ansei tsunami kuyō-hi (Saimyōji no Daijōkyō-hi) ||  || Minamiise ||  || commemorates the earthquake and tsunami on the fourth day of the tenth month of Hōei 4 (1707) || ||  || [https://www.bunka.pref.mie.lg.jp/bunkazai/da/daItemDetail?mngnum=1093086&pageCur=4 ]
|-
| align="center"|Hōei Tsunami Memorial Stele (Kanro-tera Three Worlds Myriad Souls Stele)Hōei Ansei tsunami kuyō-hi (Kanro-tera no sangai banrei-hi) ||  || Minamiise ||  || commemorates the earthquake and tsunami on the fourth day of the tenth month of Hōei 4 (1707) || ||  || [https://www.bunka.pref.mie.lg.jp/bunkazai/da/daItemDetail?mngnum=1093089&pageCur=4 ]
|-
| align="center"|Documents relating to the Tōdō Domain Iga Sakuji-gata Tōdō-han Iga sakuji-gata kanren bunsho ||  || Iga || private || 90 items || ||  || [http://www.bunka.pref.mie.lg.jp/bunkazai/da/daItemDetail?mngnum=730922&pageCur=5 ]
|-
| align="center"|Map of Iga Ueno Castle TownIga Ueno jōka e-zu ||  || Iga || private ||  by  ||  ||  || [https://www.bunka.pref.mie.lg.jp/bunkazai/da/daItemDetail?mngnum=1048384&pageCur=5 ]
|-
| align="center"|Hōei Tsunami Memorial Stele (Magoshi Cemetery Three Worlds Myriad Souls Stele)Hōei tsunami kuyō-hi (Magoshi bochi no sangai banrei-hi) ||  || Owase ||  || commemorates the earthquake and tsunami on the fourth day of the tenth month of Hōei 4 (1707) || ||  || [https://www.bunka.pref.mie.lg.jp/bunkazai/da/daItemDetail?mngnum=1109449&pageCur=6 ]
|-
